desc: At the heart of our ethos as a brand is the desire to design and create beautiful garments that minimise our effect on our planet. We firmly believe that it is possible to deliver sustainably & ethically produced bridal wear that doesn’t compromise when it comes to elegance and design. Based in leafy Cheshire.

layout.text: Elegantly Ethical Designs For The Modern Day Bride

As recommended and featured on ‘Rock My Wedding’ and Tatler.
Based in the heart of leafy Cheshire
